entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
